about_the_game:
The ASS-117A Valken joins the action from Assault Suits Valken (Cybernator outside of Japan)!
A faithful 3D rendition of Valken's titular mech, replete with weaponry based on the original game and Jake and Crea too!

"For a soldier, survival depends on fighting and defeating the enemy"

DLC Contents

This DLC contains one new rounder (the ASS-117A Valken) complete with specially designed B.O.S.S. Mode, playable in all modes except story. We've also added 4 tracks from the original Valken/Cybernator game, 2 arranged just for Senko no Ronde by the guest composer, Masahiko Ishida (R-Type 2, Ninja Spirit, Image Fight etc)

Track list:
  • We've gotta do it *
  • Till the crack of doom *
  • Asteroid run
  • We've gotta do it
(*) Arranged tracks (arranger: Masahiko Ishida)

About Assault Suits Valken/Cybernator

Assault Suits Valken was a side-scrolling action game released in 1992 by Masaya in Japan, and renamed Cybernator and released in 1993 elsewhere.
In the original, the player took control of the titular assault suit, a tank on legs, and used various weapons such as missiles, laser and punches to defeat enemies through a variety of stages.
Assault Suit Leynos shares the same setting as Valken.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i3-4160 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 570
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Core i5-4690K 3.50 GHz
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960~GTX 970
  • Additional Notes: X Input Controller recommended
